verses.verse: <S%H7378>Contend,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> with those who <S%H7378>contend<s%> with <S%H3898>me.<s%> Fight against those who fight against <S%H3898>me.<s%>
Take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H6793>buckler,<s%> and stand <S%H6965>up<s%> for my <S%H5833>help.<s%>
<S%H7324>Brandish<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> and <S%H5462>block<s%> <S%H7125>those<s%> who <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H559>me.<s%> Tell my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> "I am your <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>"

Let those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and brought to <S%H3637>dishonor.<s%> Let those who <S%H2803>plot<s%> my <S%H7451>ruin<s%> be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded.<s%>
Let them be as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4397>angel<s%> driving them <S%H1760>on.<s%>
Let their <S%H1870>way<s%> be <S%H2822>dark<s%> and <S%H2519>slippery,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4397>angel<s%> pursuing <S%H7291>them.<s%>
For without <S%H2600>cause<s%> they have <S%H2934>hidden<s%> their <S%H7568>net<s%> in a <S%H7845>pit<s%> for <S%H2600>me.<s%> Without cause they have <S%H2658>dug<s%> a pit for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Let <S%H7722>destruction<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> on him <S%H3045>unawares.<s%> Let his <S%H7568>net<s%> that he has <S%H2934>hidden<s%> <S%H3920>catch<s%> <S%H5307>himself.<s%> Let him fall into that <S%H7722>destruction.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> It shall <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

All my <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> who is like <S%H5337>you,<s%> who delivers the <S%H6041>poor<s%> from him who is too <S%H2389>strong<s%> for <S%H6041>him;<s%> yes, the poor and the <S%H6041>needy<s%> from him who robs <S%H1497>him?<s%>"
<S%H2555>Unrighteous<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> rise <S%H6965>up.<s%> They ask me about <S%H7592>things<s%> that I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know about.
They <S%H7999>reward<s%> me <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> to the <S%H7908>bereaving<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

But as for <S%H2470>me,<s%> when they were sick, my <S%H3830>clothing<s%> was <S%H8242>sackcloth.<s%> I <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting.<s%> My <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> into my own <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

I <S%H1980>behaved<s%> myself as though it had been my <S%H7453>friend<s%> or my <S%H251>brother.<s%> I bowed <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H6937>mourning,<s%> as one who <S%H57>mourns<s%> his <S%H517>mother.<s%>

But in my <S%H6761>adversity,<s%> they <S%H8055>rejoiced,<s%> and gathered themselves <S%H622>together.<s%> The <S%H5222>attackers<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%> against <S%H3045>me,<s%> and I didn't know <S%H7167>it.<s%> They tore at <S%H1826>me,<s%> and didn't cease.
Like the <S%H2611>profane<s%> <S%H3934>mockers<s%> in <S%H4580>feasts,<s%> they <S%H2786>gnashed<s%> their teeth at <S%H8127>me.<s%>
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> how long will you look <S%H7200>on?<s%> <S%H7725>Rescue<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from their <S%H7722>destruction,<s%> my <S%H3173>precious<s%> life from the <S%H3715>lions.<s%>
I will give you <S%H3034>thanks<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly.<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> you among <S%H6099>many<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H341>Don't<s%> let those who are my enemies <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over <S%H8130>me;<s%> neither let those who hate me without a <S%H2600>cause<s%> <S%H7169>wink<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
For they <S%H1696>don't<s%> speak <S%H7965>peace,<s%> but they <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> against those who are <S%H7282>quiet<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H6310>Yes,<s%> they opened their mouth <S%H7337>wide<s%> against <S%H559>me.<s%> They said, <S%H1889>"Aha!<s%> <S%H1889>Aha!<s%> Our <S%H5869>eye<s%> has seen <S%H7200>it!<s%>"
You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3068>it,<s%> Yahweh. <S%H2790>Don't<s%> keep silent. <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7368>don't<s%> be far from me.
<S%H6974>Wake<s%> <S%H5782>up!<s%> Rise up to <S%H4941>defend<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> my God! My <S%H136>Lord,<s%> contend for <S%H7379>me!<s%>
<S%H8199>Vindicate<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh my <S%H430>God,<s%> according to your <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> <S%H8055>Don't<s%> let them gloat over me.
<S%H559>Don't<s%> let them say in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H1889>"Aha!<s%> <S%H5315>That<s%>'s the way we want it!" <S%H559>Don't<s%> let them say, "We have swallowed him <S%H1104>up!<s%>"

Let them be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and <S%H954>confounded<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> who <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> at my <S%H7451>calamity.<s%> Let them be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%> and <S%H1322>dishonor<s%> who magnify themselves against <S%H1431>me.<s%>

Let them shout for <S%H7442>joy<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> who <S%H2655>favor<s%> my righteous <S%H6664>cause.<s%> <S%H559>Yes,<s%> let them say <S%H8548>continually,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified,<s%> who has <S%H2655>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant!<s%>"
My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H1897>talk<s%> about your <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and about your <S%H8416>praise<s%> all day <S%H3117>long.<s%>
